categories: Category:Grand Army of the Republic companies

nodes.text: Waterfall Company was a company of clone troopers that fought in the Battle of Kothlis during the Clone Wars.

Waterfall Company was one of the three companies (Torrent Company, Cascade Company, and Waterfall Company) to fight against the Separatists on the surface of the planet Kothlis. Their commanders were Captain Rex, Anakin Skywalker, and Jedi General Obi-Wan Kenobi.
